Package com.project.lordofthewings.Controllers

Class AuthorArrayAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
      • com.project.lordofthewings.Controllers.AuthorArrayAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.ExpandableListAdapter, android.widget.HeterogeneousExpandableList
    public class AuthorArrayAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
    Class that handles the expandable list view for the Comments and Authors List for QRCode
